entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mascouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
